DOC.brief_summary: Tramadol opioid analgesic , widely use treatment acute neuropathic pain . After oral administration , tramadol rapidly almost completely absorbed . Tramadol extensively metabolise O- N-demethylation , catalyse liver CYP-450 enzyme . O-desmethyltramadol active metabolite formation catalyse CYP2D6 . The formation inactive metabolite catalyse CYP3A4 2B6 . This study aim investigate possible interaction oral tramadol itraconazole ticlopidine , inhibitor CYP3A4 2B6 . Twelve healthy male female adult non-smoking volunteer age 18-40 year body weight within ±15 % ideal weight height take study . Primary endpoint study plasma concentration tramadol metabolite .
